config.fabric-mumblelink-mod.title: MumbleLink Config
config.fabric-mumblelink-mod.mumbleAutoL: The action to take when a VoIP server is provided. (Requires restart!)
config.fabric-mumblelink-mod.mumbleServe: The VoIP server path. Supports templating, see readme.
The VoIP server query. Supports templating, see readme.
config.fabric-mumblelink-mod.mumbleDimen: Y-Axis multiplier for dimension IDs. Usually leave it at 0.
